website_summaries.verdict: A simple facial soap that you'll keep coming back to.
pros: Liquid facial soap is gentle and effective on all skin types
Foaming soap cleans and refreshes the skin without drying it out
One pump will cover your entire face and neck
Effectively removes light, leftover makeup residue
cons: Soap does not effectively remove a full face of makeup

customer_reviews.title: Questioning authenticity from this seller
customer_reviews.text: I think I'll by from Clinique direct. I seriously question if this product is authentic from this seller, as it does not have the "certified yellow sticker" that Clinique uses when a product is purchased. I have been using this soap over the last 12-15 years (purchased from a Clinique counter) and the one from this seller has a distinct smell (which none of the previous ones I purchase from Clinique has any noticeable smell at all). And my face seems to be breaking out with the product from this seller as well, and I've never had this problem in the past either. This product when authentic is awesome, I advise buying direct from Clinique online/counter.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bynum-wynn

customer_reviews.title: Looks take & smells weird
customer_reviews.text: Could this be fake or I’m I tripping? The smell on it is strong. The bottle looks fake!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Package arrived on time BUT
customer_reviews.text: I opened my package and it was wet inside. When I tried to removed it, the top came off the bottle. There was no cover on the bottle, but I’m not sure there is suppose to be one. I’m retuning it and will order another one because I love Clinique products. I’ll try again.
customer_reviews.author: lovestoread

customer_reviews.title: Great unscented facial cleanser for sensitive skin types
customer_reviews.text: I like that this facial cleanser is easy on the skin but cleans well. There is no scent which I also like because scented cleansers tend to irratate my skin. The only complaint I have is that the bottle dispenser it comes in doesn't allow you to get the last little 1/4 of cleanser out of the bottle. I always have to take the lid off and try to get the remainder out by putting the dispenser upside down. Overall great product for any face/skin type.
customer_reviews.author: Mmagirl

customer_reviews.title: Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, but the packaging was horrible. It was in a plastic bag rolling around in a large space. It had leaked into the bag and was getting out of the bag. The lid had unscrewed itself slightly.
customer_reviews.author: SeniorSewist

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Clinique face wash for years. One bottle lasts my husband and I around 6 months which makes the price definitely worth it. I love how clean i feel after using it! I love buying it on amazon because it seems like the price is often dropped lower than what department stores sell it for. It does pretty good at getting my makeup off except for my gel eyeliner (which nothing can get off except my marykay eye makeup remover).
customer_reviews.author: Zaneta

customer_reviews.title: I use this daily and have almost no acne.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product all the time and it keeps my skin as clear as I've ever seen it. The bottle was bent just enough to stop me from being able to use the pump, but the face wash inside is still usable.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Good product!! It suits for dry skin texture
customer_reviews.text: Loved it!! I am using since 2014. It suits my skin tone. I have dry skin. Good product for those who are looking for smooth and not so oily after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Yadavi Kankanwadi

customer_reviews.title: Wow...just wow
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't see myself ever going back to using plain soap to wash my face. This is a must have for makeup lovers like myself. Having been a fan of white towels it excites me to wipe my face after a steamy shower and see absolutely NOTHING not a drop of foundation dirty my towels!!! Love love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Imani S

customer_reviews.title: Great product, slight damage
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, the best face wash I have ever used. This was my first time ordering online and the pump is broken. I am unable to use the pump which is very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this face wash. I have sensitive skin and this is the only cleanser I have found that doesn’t dry my face out or cause redness
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a fan of Clinique, but this face soap really works like a charm for my comb facial skin.
customer_reviews.author: Aria

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot, I do wish it removed makeup better. But I love how my skin feels after washing my face, just use a makeup remover first and you’re good to go
customer_reviews.author: Riley464

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be a larger bottle, should have checked the ounce’s.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Came broken without a pump. Highly annoyed!
customer_reviews.text: Came without pump. Would leave a no start rating if I could. Highly disappointed. I need the soap now, otherwise I would have returned it. Don't order this product from here :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will really love this!
customer_reviews.text: Great product that cleans your face without irritation. The bottle is easy to use (pump), and the product is wonderful!

customer_reviews.title: Cleans amazing

customer_reviews.title: So great

customer_reviews.title: It’s the stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is what it says it is. Works like it is supposed to. I only use Clinique on my face, so I would definitely know if it was a knockoff.

customer_reviews.title: Best facial soap
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for many years. It’s hands down the best for removing makeup easily, quickly, thoroughly.

customer_reviews.title: A longtime fan of hypoallergenic Clinique products.
customer_reviews.text: I love Clinique. This soap has no bubbles to get in your eyes, and it works very nicely with any of the exfoliating hand-held electric (rechargeable) scrubbers.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite face wash!
customer_reviews.text: Love this face wash. It's the only type I can use on my sensitive skin. No scent, washes well.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for years. Love the ease and results.

customer_reviews.title: Makes my face look and feel so much younger!
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel on my face! You can’t go wrong with this cleanser.

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: Living in the southwest, I already have dry skin. I don't need a cleanser that adds to it. Clinique's Cleanser is perfect for my skin type. It is mild, yet totally cleans my makeup and any mascara residue that my mascara remover missed. I've been using it for years and planned to continue.It's a great value and a great product!

customer_reviews.title: Cleans face very well...removes eye makeup easily.
customer_reviews.text: Slightly drying form 66 year old skin. Love that it’s unscented (multiple scent allergies)

customer_reviews.title: I will wait until Macys has free gift with purchase next time. Not as big as the one I get when I go in store.

customer_reviews.author: REalHousewife

customer_reviews.title: when it arrived the front of the bottle was super scratched up and it appears as if it was ...
customer_reviews.text: This face wash works wonders and makes your skin so soft. However, when it arrived the front of the bottle was super scratched up and it appears as if it was handled very poorly.

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT! It's wonderful for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap it works easily, doesn't clog pores and doesn't leave residue! I love this soap and will buy it again- I have sensitive skin and this soap has been one of the only facials soaps I've bought, which doesn't leave my face feeling dry and cracked.

customer_reviews.title: so it must be pretty good.

customer_reviews.title: Great facial treatment.
customer_reviews.text: Great for that cleanup daily in the morning and at night. Just a little dab goes a long way! I have used Clinique products for 35 years and this liquid soap is a great advancement over the bar soap.

customer_reviews.title: love this stuff

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite facial cleanser! Mild enough but removes all my makeup and keeps my skin feeling soft and hydrated!

customer_reviews.title: Good facial soap
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the products on my new allergy safe list I got from The Mayo Clinic. After using it my face feels clean and fresh, without feeling any unwanted residue. However, it's not effective at removing mascara, so I had to purchase another product.

customer_reviews.title: The item came with no box (making me question its ...
customer_reviews.text: The item came with no box (making me question its authenticity) and the cap was open. There was soap all over the inside and there's only 3/4 of the soap left in the bottle. I'm going to figure out how to return it now.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Hall

customer_reviews.title: Timeless product
customer_reviews.text: Nice you can purchase this product I’ve been using for years online. Not necessary to go to a department store!

customer_reviews.title: Love it.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very mild and cleans your face so well. No redness

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I got it within three days, started washing in combo with 2 and 3. LOVE IT!!!! Totally worth the money no more breakouts, softer skin, even tone. I'm never going back.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. My mom introduced it to me at first, and I haven't used anything else. It has been 6 years now and I still love it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Better than the soap bar

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have spent most of my life fighting acne. Since starting the 3 step Clinique program my face is totally cleared up. I can't recommend these products enough!

customer_reviews.title: I have sensitive skin and like these products very much
customer_reviews.text: I use most Clinique Products. I have sensitive skin and like these products very much.

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: great buy on this big bottle of face wash. it is mild...but tough enough to get my makeup off. it will lasts forever too.

customer_reviews.title: Best cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite cleanser. I have skin allergies and Clinique has always been good for my skin. Others mentioned they questioned whether this product was authentic, the bottle I received was exactly like my previous bottle shipped directly from Clinique. The scent was the same, bottle was the same, it worked on my face the same and I had no irritation or break-outs. I would definitely buy this product again.

customer_reviews.title: Always a good product

customer_reviews.title: Sent wrong item!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered mild and received extra mild. Since i just now opened the box, I can't return it. It doesn't even clean my face. It's like lotion and made me break out.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: This is the only face product I have used that ...

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as Clinique bar soap
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Clinique bar soap for years. I wanted to try the ease of liquid pump for dispensing. I guess it cleans about the same as their bar soap but this liquid soap does not rinse easy and/or leaves an oily film on skin.

customer_reviews.title: This was recommended by my cosmetologist

customer_reviews.title: Love Clinique!
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin, im a redhead, and this is a amazing product! Very gentle and a bottle lasts me three months! You only need a little every day! The cream also. Before I used to use simple products and was buying a bottle a month. The cream lasts me 6 months using everyday so more cost effective! I'm converted :))

product_meta.title: Clinique Liquid Facial Mild 6F37 Soap, 6.7 Ounce
product_meta.description: Contains all benefits of Clinique famous facial soap. Provides gentle cleansing without stripping. Thoroughly removes dirt, impurities and excess oil. Leaves skin feeling clean and fresh.
feature_bullets: The package weight of the product is 6.7 ounces
The package dimension of the product is 5"L x 9"W x 7"H
